item.description:
Beautiful ride through Lincoln/Great Meadows Wildlife Refuge area. Ride details posted (from an AMC ride last week). Meet up at 9:15, leave at 9:30.

DIRECTIONS: Exit onto Bedford Rd from Rt 2. Changes to Lincoln Rd. About 2 miles from Rt 2, take a right into LINCOLN Public Schools, and parking lot. This is just past intersection wth Library etc. See map.

I plan to make a couple stops to see wildlife and scenery in great meadow, (am taking my camera). The AMC was about 1.25 hour without stops, but it is too beautiful to go without stops for me. Others can choose their own pace!

Hope to see you there!

Linda
item.name: 15 mile loop in Lincoln/Great Meadows SUN AUG 1
